title: Imported new chain segment
body:
In my opinion my node is synchronized, I get "Imported new chain segment" entries in the logs. Can I be sure that my node is synchronized? In addition, when I run "eth.syncing" I get false

```
t=2021-12-20T10:25:03+0100 lvl=info msg="Imported new chain segment"             blocks=1  txs=514  mgas=39.708  elapsed=73.374ms    mgasps=541.168  number=13,636,467 hash=0x47a71a72630736261d7e6eb30ed3d7b45d2dac218e5058cc6cccab63135daab4 dirty="1.09 GiB"    ignored=1
t=2021-12-20T10:25:03+0100 lvl=info msg="do light process success at block"      num=13,636,468
t=2021-12-20T10:25:03+0100 lvl=info msg="Imported new chain segment"             blocks=2  txs=389  mgas=51.399  elapsed=205.481ms   mgasps=250.140  number=13,636,469 hash=0xb43a3d066ef8b968d65c2bb7430a4256e89318432f61c866d8f30927ec53c084 dirty="1.09 GiB"
t=2021-12-20T10:25:05+0100 lvl=info msg="Imported new chain segment"             blocks=1  txs=233  mgas=25.553  elapsed=170.356ms   mgasps=149.995  number=13,636,470 hash=0x5cfd4f720762cd084236961632ea9a39265a929688db679d4ddc5446b7dfdb75 dirty="1.09 GiB"
t=2021-12-20T10:25:09+0100 lvl=info msg="do light process success at block"      num=13,636,471
t=2021-12-20T10:25:09+0100 lvl=info msg="Imported new chain segment"             blocks=1  txs=264  mgas=34.446  elapsed=107.259ms   mgasps=321.143  number=13,636,471 hash=0xfd923d5d5646170e9803fe45b5b1683d8a25cfeaccd3a12d82ceee27aa3ac555 dirty="1.09 GiB"
t=2021-12-20T10:25:11+0100 lvl=info msg="Imported new chain segment"             blocks=1  txs=269  mgas=34.007  elapsed=203.631ms   mgasps=167.002  number=13,636,472 hash=0x65fb039343c691445b13567c3cf69d5a5b48e845b2f1973b1269bf4b4be3d333 dirty="1.09 GiB"
```
